libraryStrings.confirmDeleteSlide: Are you sure you wish to delete this slide?
libraryStrings.confirmRemoveElement: Are you sure you wish to delete this element?
libraryStrings.keywordsTip: Drag in keywords using the two buttons above.
libraryStrings.activeSurfaceWarning: Are you sure you want to activate Active Surface Mode? This action cannot be undone.
libraryStrings.templateDescription: Will be applied to all slides not overridden by any ":currentSlide" settings.
libraryStrings.currentSlideDescription: Will be applied to this slide only, and will override any ":template" settings.
libraryStrings.aspectRatioSubtitle: The aspect ratio applies to all slides. It can not be changed later on.
